nodes.text: Little Talhovi was a world located in the Little Talhovi system of the Juvex sector, a part of the Senex-Juvex region in the Western Reaches portion of the Mid Rim. A hyperlane connected it to the Talhovi system. Little Talhovi was considered to be a promising agriworld by 43 ABY and, like the rest of the Senex-Juvex worlds, was under the control of the region's aristocratic Ancient Houses.
Little Talhovi was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which was authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and which placed the world in grid square K-18.
